data.benefits: NEDFi would lend the amount at Prime Lending Rate (PLR) + 0.5 % (administrative charge).
data.eligibility: All MFIs which have been in existence for at least 3 years; the MFIs should have good credibility record. Voluntary agencies are also eligible to apply.
data.conditions: All Micro Finance Institutes (MFI) who have good credibility record. Voluntary agencies are also eligible to apply.
data.beneficiaries: All Micro Finance Institutes (MFIs)  which have been in existence for at least 3 years; the MFIs should have good credibility record. Voluntary agencies are also eligible to apply.
data.prerequisites: Processing fee to the extent of maximum 1% of loan amount
data.context: The scheme envisages meeting micro credit needs Small and Medium size agriculturists, self- employed personnel and entrepreneurs can be reached much more effectively by involving the services of intermediaries, who can understand needs, demand and local situations. Developing and supporting NGOs/ Voluntary Agencies (VAs) with good track record for on-lending to the “needy” for taking up any income generating activities in the rural areas.
data.objective: The scheme envisages meeting micro credit needs Small and Medium size agriculturists, self- employed personnel and entrepreneurs can be reached much more effectively by involving the services of intermediaries, who can understand needs, demand and local situations. Developing and supporting NGOs/ Voluntary Agencies (VAs) with good track record for on-lending to the “needy” for taking up any income generating activities in the rural areas.
data.description: NEDFi would lend the amount at Prime Lending Rate (PLR) + 0.5 % (administrative charge).
data.funding_facilitator: North Eastern Development Finance Corporation Limited (NEDFi)
data.additional_info: The MFI have to comply with RBI norms
data.checklist_info_a:
1.) Udyam Registration Certificate 
2.) Photo identity
3.) Address proof
4.) KYC documents
5.) Loan Agreement
data.checklist_info_b: Loan For Micro Finance Institute - NEDFi

data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
